ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Invis: who cares, Regain focus.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That was my major gripe with it going in at 39, it s just too late at that point.  Not too late for Lguk, just in general most classes with invis undead
ygData.messageBody:
> past crimes it will never happen. On the other hand, the "invisi to undead"
> version of this song would be perfect for the level 39 slot if not just a
> tad late.

That was my major gripe with it going in at 39, it's just too late
at that point. Not too late for Lguk, just in general most classes
with invis undead get it very early in the game. This song should
have come soon after our L19 song. I'm not arguing that having it
wouldn't be nice. It's just I have no problem with bumming an
invis from someone at the zoneline. People are usually pretty
helpful in that manner.

> BTW, is there something wrong with playing with gnolls? Gotta love all that
> barking!

Those dogs make me want to turn off 3D Audio ;-) My cat goes nuts.

Harmonic.
